name.ja: <ruby>暗<rt>あん</rt></ruby><ruby>黒<rt>こく</rt></ruby>の<ruby>格<rt>かく</rt></ruby><ruby>闘<rt>とう</rt></ruby><ruby>場<rt>じょう</rt></ruby>

effect.en: While this card is face-up in the Field Zone, face-up monsters on the field with 2100 original DEF gain 500 ATK, and if "Gaia The Fierce Knight" or "Gaia the Dragon Champion" attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference).
